description: Metadata and short summaries for sample resumes. Use with sample-employees.json. Resume files can be placeholder PDFs/DOCX or real uploads.

resumes.summary: Technology Consultant with 3 years at EY. Experience in cloud advisory, data analytics, and client delivery. Skills: Python, SQL, Azure, project management.
Assurance Staff, 5 years. CPA. Focus on financial statement audits and internal controls. Industries: financial services, healthcare.
Tax Senior Staff, 4 years. Corporate tax compliance and provision. Experience with multinational clients and tax technology tools.
Consulting Analyst, 2 years. Strategy and operations. Analytics, process improvement, and client workshops.
Technology Consultant, 1 year. Software development and integration. Skills: C#, .NET, APIs, agile.
